pages.title: Dough balls
pages.text: Gloopy, sentient lumps of unbaked destiny, rollin’ wherever their squishy little ‘eyes’ take ‘em. These yeasty yeeters don’t stop for nobody—tables, chairs, porce-fuhrers. Bowled over. Shitty variant has uncontrollable diarrhea btw. Their only fear is the fox - it can devour them. By the time they harden, check the next page about it.

pages.title: Nutritional blocks
pages.text: To prevent dough balls from hardening you can use nutritional blocks. While dough balls are rollin' on them - they won't die.
